name: SpaceRunner (BenjaminPram)
description:
SpaceRunner

Why play this game? This game is very fast paced which requires you to move fast so that you can get that high score. 

It’s an endless runner where you must destroy oncoming meteoroids where you use the three rows to interact with to go up and down. 

The rules are that you have to move up and down the screen to shoot the meteoroids or you will have to restart.

The goal is to have the highest score and be the best. 

  • Fast paced action
  • Challenge yourself each time
  • Make that record yours 

Release date:  2/06/20

Platforms: PC

Price: Free

Contact information:

Email: Benjaminpram@gmail.com 

Bio: Zedracorp
